items.content_html: Todo is a lightweight, user-friendly task management application designed to help users efficiently organize, track, and prioritize their daily tasks. Built with modern web technologies, this project emphasizes simplicity, ease-of-use, and performance, making task management seamless whether you're at home or on the go.
